title: How long do you have to wait for the PBE?
body: I had signed up for the PBE {{summoner:6}} request a week ago and still waiting.{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}

replies.body: My acceptance came after about 18 to 24 months, so yeah, it can take a while.

There's no definitive amount of time to be accepted to the pbe, and it's not something we can force or expedite.  We do have information on how applicants are chosen in our [PBE Faq](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  I wish you the best of luck with your application!
